PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-07592008-04-11,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of WALTER R. PARSONS of Ottawa, Ontario, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective April 21, 2008.
